lftools v0.8.0 Release Notes
============================

Thanks to Anil, and Thanh for contributing to this release.


Notable changes since v0.7.0
----------------------------

Changes related to documentation or refactoring. No new features or
functionality added.


Full Change Log
---------------

94f4573 Thanh Ha        Add all release notes up to date
bff3ad6 Anil Belur      Re-factor deploy maven file to remove dup code
1d6b441 Thanh Ha        Convert license print statements to logger
dd711cb Anil Belur      Fix best practice doc example code indent
4485c2d Thanh Ha        Verify lftools scripts have license headers
